p:
A series of parameters of the networks for O. fragrans var. thunbergii essential oil were investigated for more interpretation. Degree ( k) was first calculated and ranked to evaluate the importance of a node. The degree k
i indicates the number of edges connecting to the node i. Mean value of k
i for all nodes in the network is defined as average degree, denoted as ⟨ k⟩. Degree distribution, the proportion of randomly selected nodes with a certain number of connections, was represented as P(k).
